channel.title: Deadmau5 - Faxing Berlin Remake by T3CH [Collab?]
channel.description:
I’ve had trouble replicating Deadmau5’s Faxing Berlin but I have the main chords for it, let’s finish it! Repost on this thread because I’m genuinely stuck....
https://app.auxy.co/projects/lwQ6cr8YeN-AEsAu9E8amw==

item.title: Deadmau5 - Faxing Berlin Remake by T3CH [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Just be careful where you post this, haha. This article is old, but a few years back it seems more lawsuits were ordered up for mashups and remixes.

MusicRadar

FL Studio user faces legal action for using built-in samples

Deadmau5-produced loops spark controversy

Read full topic
item.source: Deadmau5 - Faxing Berlin Remake by T3CH [Collab?]

item.title: Deadmau5 - Faxing Berlin Remake by T3CH [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
Okay, so I looked at the file and also did some research. Tunebat says that the BPM is 128, which is per the norm for Joel. It also says that the key is D minor, so there’s that too.

Oh, yeah, did I mention the cowbell? There’s a cowbell. I’ll add the cowbell later, or you can. It’s really just the Nu Disco one. (Also, I don’t want to seem like I’m taking control of the whole thing; I’m not. This is your remake, I’m just helping out!)

Read full topic
